meanings.sent1: The lionesses in the pride protect their cubs.
meanings.sent2: A group of lionesses is hunting for food in the savanna.
meanings.sent3: The lionesses decided to have a race to see who is the fastest.
meanings.sent4: She moved through the crowd with the grace and power of lionesses.
meanings.sent5: The roar of the lionesses echoed through the valley, signaling their presence.

meanings.sent1: We saw a pride of lionesses resting under the shade of a tree.
meanings.sent2: The zoo has several lionesses in their exhibit.
meanings.sent3: The lionesses gathered for a group photo, all looking majestic.
meanings.sent4: The lionesses on the savanna seemed to blend into the golden grass.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the lionesses' footsteps filled the night as they moved together.
